review: I dumped my subscription to cable tv about 8 years ago, get good reception with over the air channels, and have been content to supplement it with a Roku player. The one cable channel I missed was ESPN. When I found out it was available without a cable subscription on Sling TV I tried to add it to my Roku HD (1st generation) and found out it wasn't supported by older Roku devices. So I upgraded to the Roku Stick about a month ago. It loads noticeably faster and provides a smoother experience than the device it replaces which is to be expected as it has a faster processor and twice as much memory. Sling TV works great with it. I use the supplied power adapter, haven't had any issues with the remote, and the Roku smartphone app also works perfectly with it.
